name: Markdown Blog
about: Here's a project that can be valuable for developers who want to have a blog simply and most cheaply. Deploying on Vercel, it's free for hobby accounts. This blog project doesn't use a database, and the posts are Markdown files.

name: Cous De La Construction
about: Portfolio Website was written using Next.js, consuming the WordPress API.

name: E-Commerce Application
about: This project intends to be an appliable e-commerce application with a functional deployed website direct from our OpenSource repository.
